name: Escape from Medusa
description: Escape from Medusa is a local multiplayer game for 2 players in which one of the players plays Perseus and his objective is to free a boy who wants to escape from the cave where Medusa is, the player's objective is to cover the boy (a ball in this case) so that Medusa (player 2) does not petrify it. Player 2's goal is to kill the boy. And just hit the left arrow on the keyboard. Perseus instead moves with the WASD keys.
